Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.character.action

package it.polimi.ingsw.model.character.action
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.model.character
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.model.character.actiondata
     
  • Class
    Description
    Action
    This interface is implemented by each Characters' action.
    BanAction
    The ban action is used to ban an island.
    CalculateInfluenceAction
    This action is used to calculate the influence on a chosen island, when a character permits it.
    MoveAction
    Thi action is used to move a group of students from a place to another following the logic of the characters.
    SetInfluenceStrategyAction
    This action is used to set the strategy of the influence calculation to that specified by the character.
    SetProfStrategyAction
    This action is used to set the professor assignor's strategy to that specified by the character.
    StepsIncrementAction
    This action is used to let the player move mother nature a number of steps greater than the one specified on the chosen Assistant card.
    SwapAction
    This action is used to swap students when a character permits it.
    ThiefAction
    This action is used to steal students from the hall of the player following characters' logic.
